attributes.action: Stop the banks getting rid of free banking.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been surgested that the banks will charge every one to have a bank account so they can make up the lose of the reduced charges from credit cards.  This is an unfair policy to the poor who only get benefits paid in to the account so could not afford this extra cost

rejection.details: petitions on this subject already exist
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
